replies.author: Nullz
replies.content:
While it is true, you can use the remote CDN method



	PHP:
	

<link href="//netdna.bootstrapcdn.com/font-awesome/4.1.0/css/font-awesome.min.css" rel="stylesheet">


        
You are completely dependent on an outside source and it can add more page lookup time to your site.

I am often surprised people do not know you can host Font Awesome locally.

Step 1 
Download latest copy of Font Awesome
Your post count must be 5 in order to see this link. You currently have 0 post(s)

Step 2
Extract zip file

Step 3
Rename extract folder to



	PHP:
	

 font-awesome 


        
Step 4 
Upload folder to your domain root

Important - Must be uploaded to your domain root, does not matter where your forum is. So even if your forum is located in

domain.com/wherever/

You need this 1 folder located in

/

The location of your forum is irelivent (does not matter).

Step 5
In the following template: PAGE_CONTAINER

Look for



	PHP:
	

<head>


        
Directly below it add (read carefully)



	PHP:
	

<link rel="stylesheet" href="//YOUR-domain-name-HERE/font-awesome/css/font-awesome.min.css">


        
Replace "YOUR-domain-name-HERE' with your domain name.

Save.
Done

You are now hosting Font Awesome locally.
You're welcome

replies.author: Nullz
replies.content:
While it is true, you can use the remote CDN method



	PHP:
	

<link href="//netdna.bootstrapcdn.com/font-awesome/4.1.0/css/font-awesome.min.css" rel="stylesheet">


        
You are completely dependent on an outside source and it can add more page lookup time to your site.

I am often surprised people do not know you can host Font Awesome locally.

Step 1 
Download latest copy of Font Awesome
Your post count must be 5 in order to see this link. You currently have 0 post(s)

Step 2
Extract zip file

Step 3
Rename extract folder to



	PHP:
	

 font-awesome 


        
Step 4 
Upload folder to your domain root

Important - Must be uploaded to your domain root, does not matter where your forum is. So even if your forum is located in

domain.com/wherever/

You need this 1 folder located in

/

The location of your forum is irelivent (does not matter).

Step 5
In the following template: PAGE_CONTAINER

Look for



	PHP:
	

<head>


        
Directly below it add (read carefully)



	PHP:
	

<link rel="stylesheet" href="//YOUR-domain-name-HERE/font-awesome/css/font-awesome.min.css">


        
Replace "YOUR-domain-name-HERE' with your domain name.

Save.
Done

You are now hosting Font Awesome locally.
You're welcome

replies.author: Nullz
replies.content:
While it is true, you can use the remote CDN method



	PHP:
	

<link href="//netdna.bootstrapcdn.com/font-awesome/4.1.0/css/font-awesome.min.css" rel="stylesheet">


        
You are completely dependent on an outside source and it can add more page lookup time to your site.

I am often surprised people do not know you can host Font Awesome locally.

Step 1 
Download latest copy of Font Awesome
Your post count must be 5 in order to see this link. You currently have 0 post(s)

Step 2
Extract zip file

Step 3
Rename extract folder to



	PHP:
	

 font-awesome 


        
Step 4 
Upload folder to your domain root

Important - Must be uploaded to your domain root, does not matter where your forum is. So even if your forum is located in

domain.com/wherever/

You need this 1 folder located in

/

The location of your forum is irelivent (does not matter).

Step 5
In the following template: PAGE_CONTAINER

Look for



	PHP:
	

<head>


        
Directly below it add (read carefully)



	PHP:
	

<link rel="stylesheet" href="//YOUR-domain-name-HERE/font-awesome/css/font-awesome.min.css">


        
Replace "YOUR-domain-name-HERE' with your domain name.

Save.
Done

You are now hosting Font Awesome locally.
You're welcome

replies.author: Nullz
replies.content:
While it is true, you can use the remote CDN method



	PHP:
	

<link href="//netdna.bootstrapcdn.com/font-awesome/4.1.0/css/font-awesome.min.css" rel="stylesheet">


        
You are completely dependent on an outside source and it can add more page lookup time to your site.

I am often surprised people do not know you can host Font Awesome locally.

Step 1 
Download latest copy of Font Awesome
Your post count must be 5 in order to see this link. You currently have 0 post(s)

Step 2
Extract zip file

Step 3
Rename extract folder to



	PHP:
	

 font-awesome 


        
Step 4 
Upload folder to your domain root

Important - Must be uploaded to your domain root, does not matter where your forum is. So even if your forum is located in

domain.com/wherever/

You need this 1 folder located in

/

The location of your forum is irelivent (does not matter).

Step 5
In the following template: PAGE_CONTAINER

Look for



	PHP:
	

<head>


        
Directly below it add (read carefully)



	PHP:
	

<link rel="stylesheet" href="//YOUR-domain-name-HERE/font-awesome/css/font-awesome.min.css">


        
Replace "YOUR-domain-name-HERE' with your domain name.

Save.
Done

You are now hosting Font Awesome locally.
You're welcome

replies.author: Nullz
replies.content:
While it is true, you can use the remote CDN method



	PHP:
	

<link href="//netdna.bootstrapcdn.com/font-awesome/4.1.0/css/font-awesome.min.css" rel="stylesheet">


        
You are completely dependent on an outside source and it can add more page lookup time to your site.

I am often surprised people do not know you can host Font Awesome locally.

Step 1 
Download latest copy of Font Awesome
Your post count must be 5 in order to see this link. You currently have 0 post(s)

Step 2
Extract zip file

Step 3
Rename extract folder to



	PHP:
	

 font-awesome 


        
Step 4 
Upload folder to your domain root

Important - Must be uploaded to your domain root, does not matter where your forum is. So even if your forum is located in

domain.com/wherever/

You need this 1 folder located in

/

The location of your forum is irelivent (does not matter).

Step 5
In the following template: PAGE_CONTAINER

Look for



	PHP:
	

<head>


        
Directly below it add (read carefully)



	PHP:
	

<link rel="stylesheet" href="//YOUR-domain-name-HERE/font-awesome/css/font-awesome.min.css">


        
Replace "YOUR-domain-name-HERE' with your domain name.

Save.
Done

You are now hosting Font Awesome locally.
You're welcome
